ModMetaData.name: Stackable Chunks [1.0]
ModMetaData.author: EarthyTurtle
ModMetaData.description:
For Rimworld Version [1.0] | Version 1.0.2
A small, simple mod that makes chunks stackable instead of singular.
Compatibility: - Placeable anywhere in your mod list below core. - Probably safest to start a new world, but should work with existing saves, uninstall at your own risk.
'Stackable Chunks' is under the creative commons license. Cite, learn and use aspects from this mod, credit optional but appreciated ;). Please do not outright copy this mod and/or re-upload without my consent.
